description.narrative: Strengthened capacity at central and municipal levels to improve access to social services including cash assistance benefits by the most excluded children and families for all communities, including Kosovo Serbs, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Economic And Social Policy General, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Protection, Social Protection (Covid), Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, institutions in Kosovo at central and municipal levels are accountable and responsive to monitoring children's rights, promoting social inclusion, and advancing a social protection system (grants and services) that is also responsive to the needs of the most marginalized children (including vulnerable returnee children belonging to all ethnic communities)

mailing-address.narrative: Nr. 1 Ali Pashë Tepelena Street Prishtina

sector.narrative: Cash Transfers - social protection data management (management information system, social and beneficiary registries, M&E systems)

Cash Transfers: Technical support to government cash transfer system development and expansion (design, targeting, beneficiary selection, grievance mechanism, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)
National social protection strategies: Policies, strategies, legislation and coordination (inter-ministerial, donor)
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity at central and municipal levels to improve access to social services including cash assistance benefits by the most excluded children and families for all communities, including Kosovo Serbs

description.narrative: The national Strategy and Action Plan on Children's Rights 2019-2023 was finalized with support UNICEF Kosovo and approved by the government. The government has approved the Concept Document on Social Services and the Concept Document on Local Finances. Inter-ministerial working groups have been established to draft the Law on Social Services and the Law on Local Finance. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/01/2020

title.narrative: 2.2 Policy/Strategy: Existence of valid national social protection strategy and/or policy

baseline.value: Development of the Concept Document for the Law on Social Services

target.value: 2020:Approval of the new Law on Social and Family Services
